org.minijson.parser

Interface TraceableJsonParser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonParser

    public interface TraceableJsonParser
extends JsonParser
    JsonParser with tracing/debugging information.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableTracing()
      Disable "tracing".
      void enableTracing()
      Enable "tracing".
      boolean isTracingEnabled()
      Returns true if "tracing" is enabled.
      Object tailNodesAsString(int length) 
      Object[] tailNodeStream(int length)

      JsonToken[] tailTokenStream(int length) 

      • Methods inherited from interface org.minijson.parser.JsonParser

        parse, parse

    • Method Detail

      • enableTracing

        void enableTracing()
        Enable "tracing". Tracing, at this point, means that we simply keep the token/nodes in a tail buffer so that when an error occurs we can see the "exception context".

      • disableTracing

        void disableTracing()
        Disable "tracing".

      • isTracingEnabled

        boolean isTracingEnabled()
        Returns true if "tracing" is enabled.
        Returns:
        whether "tracing" is enabled or not.

      • tailTokensAsString

        JsonToken tailTokensAsString(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - Max length of the tokens to be returned from the tail buffer.
        Returns:
        the tail part of the tail token buffer as a string.

      • tailTokenStream

        JsonToken[] tailTokenStream(int length)

      • tailNodesAsString

        Object tailNodesAsString(int length)
        Parameters:
        length - Max length of the nodes to be returned from the tail buffer.
        Returns:
        the tail part of the tail node buffer as a string.

      • tailNodeStream

        Object[] tailNodeStream(int length)
